snippet: City leaders should promptly disavow negative ads before the attacks spiral out of control.
abstract: Editorial condemns political ads criticizing New York City mayoral candidate Christine Quinn that were financed by PAC-style shadow organization known as New York City Is Not for Sale; calls on all candidates for city office to disavow such tactics, saying they threaten city's exemplary campaign finance system.
lead_paragraph: City leaders should promptly disavow negative ads before the attacks spiral out of control.

headline.seo: A Phantom Ad Joins New York’s Mayoral Race
headline.main: A Phantom Ad Comes to New York
headline.print_headline: A Phantom Ad Comes to New York
